sn48.19:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn48.19:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn48.19:5.2: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, indriyasampanno hotī”ti?
sn48.19:5.3: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saddhindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ, vīriyindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ, satindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ, samādhindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ, paññindriyaṃ bhāveti upasamagāmiṃ sambodhagāmiṃ.
sn48.19:5.4: Ettāvatā kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu indriyasampanno hotī”ti.
